mapper.insert: insert into room_tbl(roomName, standardNum, maximumNum, roomArea, roomForm, roomType, remarks, facilities, weekDay, weekend) values(#{roomName}, #{standardNum}, #{maximumNum}, #{roomArea}, #{roomForm}, #{roomType}, #{remarks}, #{facilities}, #{weekDay}, #{weekend})
mapper.select: select roomName from room_tbl where rno=#{rno}
